channel.title: Projects on Jayaprakash Akula
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jayaprakash Akula

item.title: Self supervised audio-visual learning
item.description: The thesis has revolved around multi-modal learning and how self-supervised objectives learn better embeddings.

item.title: Investigating self-supervised architectures for learning speech representations
item.description: In this project I along with my research group have explored various audio encoders.

item.title: Self-supervised cross modality representation learning
item.description: The seminar has focused around multi-modal learning and how self-supervised objectives learn better embeddings.

item.title: Sahayatra Android App
item.description: I have worked on developing a robust and open-source ride dispatch application.
